Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Slaughter Prop. No. 1 -- Wet/Dry-6%PkgAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Slaughter Propositions
Proposition No. 1
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume be permitted by package only and not for consumption on the premises in the Town of Slaughter, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Slaughter Prop. No. 2 -- Wet/Dry-6%ConAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Slaughter Propositions
Proposition No. 2
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing not more than six percent alcohol by volume for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Slaughter, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Slaughter Prop. No. 3 -- Wet/Dry-1/2%ConAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Slaughter Propositions
Proposition No. 3
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverage alcohol containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Slaughter, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Slaughter Prop. No. 4 -- Wet/Dry-1/2%PkgAlcoh. - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Slaughter Propositions
Proposition No. 4
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of alcoholic content containing one-half of one percent alcohol by volume and above by the package only and not for consumption on the premises be permitted in the Town of Slaughter, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: Town of Slaughter Prop. No. 5 -- Wet/Dry-Restaurant - M&BOA
Race.SummaryText:
Town of Slaughter Propositions
Proposition No. 5
Race.FullText: Shall the sale of beverages of high and low alcoholic content be permitted only on the premises of restaurant establishments which have been issued an "R" permit as defined by law in the Town of Slaughter, State of Louisiana?
